snippet.title: Over Islands - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2477160/Over_Islands
Itchio : https://aridide-production.itch.io/over-islands

Immerse yourself in a single-player, first-person adventure that combines frenetic action, city management and thrilling quests in an immersive universe. You will develop your flying island and explore the unknown lands of Azordian. Reconnect the islands together and rally their inhabitants to your cause! Face demonic enemies and become more and more powerful during your adventure!

Website : http://aridide-production.com/overislands
Discord : https://discord.com/invite/YE5T9hv6UQ
Twitter : https://twitter.com/Over_Islands
